intro.title: Namaste There!
intro.description: I'm a full stack developer based in Mumbai, welcome to my online portfolio!

sections.title: Skills & Tech
sections.description: Full stack developer with strong command over JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Express. Experienced in building scalable automation systems, internal tools, and real-time applications using MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis, and WebRTC.

sections.title: Experience
sections.description: 3+ years across enterprise SaaS, automation, and banking tech. Led engineering teams, delivered 80+ automation systems, and contributed to significant process optimizations and architectural design in high-impact projects.

sections.title: Beyond Code
sections.description: Tech enthusiast who enjoys designing efficient systems, leading teams, and mentoring. Passionate about clean UI, open source, and building tools that reduce friction and save time.
